review:
I undoubtedly appreciate the doc. He briefed the issue that i am facing and also the precautionary steps to be taken further.
Though i feel the treatment fee was kind of expensive but all other things are fine

I went overthere because i was suffering from pain in my tooth not able to eat anything  and serioulsy dr shivesh and dr vidhi did an amazing work in my tooth after that i got the complete relief  apart from this they are frankly also so over all i can say it's a  really good and budget friendly

review:
Doctor is very experienced and explained the entire process .
The surgery was painless and very efficiently completed.

Outstanding services, overall quite relief /  satisfaction achieved during dental treatment at clinic. Clinic also found equipped with most modern facilities & instruments.
Excellent service & care.
Regards

review: It was really good experience. Facility is very neat and clean with the latest equipments. Hygiene condition are maintained very well. Treatment Charges are also reasonable compare to the other dental clinics.
It was a nice experience. But hospital liquid soap device is not working. Proper sanitation is very important to taken care of at this pandemic time
